Section.name: Highlighted Additions/Changes
Section.p: This release contains the following significant updates and extensions to the SIF specification.

ul.li: TimeTableContainer - Proposed out of investigation into publishing Timetables. This object is considered “experimental”.
AccountCodeList – added to Financial objects - Vic

PaymentReceipt - TransactionType - enumerations “Creditor Reverse Payment, Creditor Reverse Receipt, GL Reverse Payment, GL Reverse Receipt, GL Reverse Receipt, Debtor Reverse Payment, Debtor Reverse Receipt, Employee Payroll” added

ul.h5: Addition to Wellbeing Characteristic Classification for Dietary Preferences
ul.li: Wellbeing Characteristic Classification - DP- Dietary Preference Added
Wellbeing Characteristic Category - DP- Dietary Preference Added
Wellbeing Characteristic Sub-Category – additions to cater for; Vegetarian, Vegan, Pescatarian, Fruitarian, Kosher, Halal, Lacto-vegetarian, Ovo-lacto-vegetarian, Non-dairy and Lactose Free
Supplementary values added to ACStrandType for ReligiousStudies and Other
Addition of “Combined” Primary and Secondary to Education Level Code Set for AG Collections
AttendanceTimes in StudentAttendanceTimeList has been made “Optional”

ul.p: Please note that the AG Collection objects have been removed from the initial 3.4.6 release due to changes that will be required for future functionality. They will be added with an errata release when new changes have been tested and approved by stakeholders.
